custom_nodes.author: #NOTICE_1.13
custom_nodes.title: NOTICE: This channel is not the default channel.
custom_nodes.description:
If you see this message, your ComfyUI-Manager is outdated.
Recent channel provides only the list of the latest nodes. If you want to find the complete node list, please go to the Default channel.

custom_nodes.author: florestefano1975
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-prompt-composer
custom_nodes.description: A suite of tools for prompt management. Combining nodes helps the user sequence strings for prompts, also creating logical groupings if necessary. Individual nodes can be chained together in any order.

custom_nodes.author: ai-liam
custom_nodes.title: LiamUtil
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: LiamLoadImage. This node provides the capability to load images from a URL.

custom_nodes.author: jesenzhang
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_StreamDiffusion
custom_nodes.description: This is a simple implementation StreamDiffusion(A Pipeline-Level Solution for Real-Time Interactive Generation) for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: an90ray
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DareMerge
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: RErouter, String (RE), Int (RE)

custom_nodes.author: Crystian
custom_nodes.title: Crystools
custom_nodes.description:
You can see the metadata and compare between two images, compare between two JSONs, show any value to console/display, pipes, and more!
This provides a better nodes to load images, previews, etc, and see "hidden" data, but without load a new workflow.

custom_nodes.author: 54rt1n
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DareMerge
custom_nodes.description: Merge two checkpoint models by dare ties [a/(https://github.com/yule-BUAA/MergeLM)](https://github.com/yule-BUAA/MergeLM), sort of.

custom_nodes.author: Kangkang625
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Paint-by-Example
custom_nodes.description: This repo is a simple implementation of [a/Paint-by-Example](https://github.com/Fantasy-Studio/Paint-by-Example) based on its [a/huggingface pipeline](https://huggingface.co/Fantasy-Studio/Paint-by-Example).

custom_nodes.author: pkpk
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SaveAVIF
custom_nodes.description: A custom node on ComfyUI that saves images in AVIF format. Workflow can be loaded from images saved at this node.

custom_nodes.author: styler00dollar
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-deepcache
custom_nodes.description:
This extension provides nodes for [a/DeepCache: Accelerating Diffusion Models for Free](https://arxiv.org/abs/2312.00858)
NOTE:Original code can be found [a/here](https://gist.github.com/laksjdjf/435c512bc19636e9c9af4ee7bea9eb86). Full credit to laksjdjf for sharing the code.

custom_nodes.author: edenartlab
custom_nodes.title: eden_comfy_pipelines
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:CLIP Interrogator.

custom_nodes.author: Limitex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Diffusers
custom_nodes.description: This extension enables the use of the diffuser pipeline in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: Limitex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Calculation
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Center Calculation. Improved Numerical Calculation for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: Comfyui_GPT_Story
custom_nodes.title: junglehu
custom_nodes.description: GPT+Comfyui Generate coherent pictures

custom_nodes.author: HarroweD and quadmoon
custom_nodes.title: Harronode
custom_nodes.description: Harronode is a custom node designed to build prompts easily for use with the Harrlogos SDXL LoRA. This Node simplifies the process of crafting prompts and makes all built in activation terms available at your fingertips.

custom_nodes.author: styler00dollar
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-sudo-latent-upscale
custom_nodes.description: Directly upscaling inside the latent space. Model was trained for SD1.5 and drawn content. Might add new architectures or update models at some point. This took heavy inspriration from [city96/SD-Latent-Upscaler](https://github.com/city96/SD-Latent-Upscaler) and [Ttl/ComfyUi_NNLatentUpscale](https://github.com/Ttl/ComfyUi_NNLatentUpscale).

custom_nodes.author: thecooltechguy
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ComfyRun
custom_nodes.description: The easiest way to run & share any ComfyUI workflow [a/https://comfyrun.com](https://comfyrun.com)

custom_nodes.author: ceruleandeep
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI LLaVA Captioner
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI extension for chatting with your images. Runs on your own system, no external services used, no filter. Uses the [a/LLaVA multimodal LLM](https://llava-vl.github.io/) so you can give instructions or ask questions in natural language. It's maybe as smart as GPT3.5, and it can see.

custom_nodes.author: jitcoder
custom_nodes.title: LoraInfo
custom_nodes.description: Shows Lora information from CivitAI and outputs trigger words and example prompt

custom_nodes.author: ttulttul
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Iterative Mixing Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Iterative Mixing KSampler, Batch Unsampler, Iterative Mixing KSampler Advanced

custom_nodes.author: OpenArt-AI
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Assistant
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Assistant is your one stop plugin for everything you need to get started with comfy-ui. Now it provides useful courses, tutorials, and basic templates.

custom_nodes.author: shockz0rz
custom_nodes.title: comfy-easy-grids
custom_nodes.description: A set of custom nodes for creating image grids, sequences, and batches in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: CosmicLaca
custom_nodes.title: Primere nodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This extension provides various utility nodes. Inputs(prompt, styles, dynamic, merger, ...), Outputs(style pile), Dashboard(selectors, loader, switch, ...), Networks(LORA, Embedding, Hypernetwork), Visuals(visual selectors, )

custom_nodes.author: ZHO-ZHO-ZHO
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Gemini
custom_nodes.description: Using Gemini-pro & Gemini-pro-vision in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: ZHO-ZHO-ZHO
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Portrait Master 简体中文版.

custom_nodes.author: Continue7777
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-easyapi-nodes
custom_nodes.description: This plugin gives you the ability to generate a real Product rendering, commonly referred to as the mockup.The most important is that we can provide it for you,cause we have a complete supply chain.You can buy products with your designs or sell them. We can provide you dropshipping services.

custom_nodes.author: RenderRift
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-RenderRiftNodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:RR_Date_Folder_Format, RR_Image_Metadata_Overlay, RR_VideoPathMetaExtraction, RR_DisplayMetaOptions. This extension provides nodes designed to enhance the Animatediff workflow.

custom_nodes.author: Haoming02
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Floodgate
custom_nodes.description: This is an Extension for ComfyUI, which allows you to control the logic flow with just one click!

custom_nodes.author: Trung0246
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-0246
custom_nodes.description: Random nodes for ComfyUI I made to solve my struggle with ComfyUI (ex: pipe, process). Have varying quality.

custom_nodes.title: comfyui-psd2png
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Psd2Png.

custom_nodes.author: IDGallagher
custom_nodes.title: IG Interpolation Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes to aid in the exploration of Latent Space

custom_nodes.author: rcfcu2000
custom_nodes.title: zhihuige-nodes-comfyui
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Combine ZHGMasks, Cover ZHGMasks, ZHG FaceIndex, ZHG SaveImage, ZHG SmoothEdge, ZHG GetMaskArea, ...

custom_nodes.author: rcsaquino
custom_nodes.title: rcsaquino/comfyui-custom-nodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: VAE Processor, VAE Loader, Background Remover

custom_nodes.author: mozman
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_mozman_nodes
custom_nodes.description:
This extension provides styler nodes for SDXL.

NOTE: Due to the dynamic nature of node name definitions, ComfyUI-Manager cannot recognize the node list from this extension. The Missing nodes and Badge features are not available for this extension.

custom_nodes.author: meap158
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Background-Replacement
custom_nodes.description: Instantly replace your image's background.

custom_nodes.author: florestefano1975
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-portrait-master
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Portrait Master. A node designed to help AI image creators to generate prompts for human portraits.

custom_nodes.author: deroberon
custom_nodes.title: StableZero123-comfyui
custom_nodes.description: StableZero123 is a node wrapper that uses the model and technique provided [here](https://github.com/SUDO-AI-3D/zero123plus/). It uses the Zero123plus model to generate 3D views using just one image.

custom_nodes.author: dmarx
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Keyframed
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes to facilitate parameter/prompt keyframing using comfyui nodes for defining and manipulating parameter curves. Essentially provides a ComfyUI interface to the [a/keyframed](https://github.com/dmarx/keyframed) library.

custom_nodes.author: TripleHeadedMonkey
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_MileHighStyler
custom_nodes.description: This extension provides various SDXL Prompt Stylers. See: [a/youtube](https://youtu.be/WBHI-2uww7o?si=dijvDaUI4nmx4VkF)

custom_nodes.author: Extraltodeus
custom_nodes.title: sigmas_tools_and_the_golden_scheduler
custom_nodes.description: A few nodes to mix sigmas and a custom scheduler that uses phi, then one using eval() to be able to schedule with custom formulas.

custom_nodes.author: BennyKok
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Deploy
custom_nodes.description: Open source comfyui deployment platform, a vercel for generative workflow infra.

custom_nodes.author: Rui
custom_nodes.title: RUI-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Rui's workflow-specific custom node, written using GPT.

custom_nodes.author: SpaceKendo
custom_nodes.title: Text to video for Stable Video Diffusion in ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This is node replaces the init_image conditioning for the [a/Stable Video Diffusion](https://github.com/Stability-AI/generative-models) image to video model with text embeds, together with a conditioning frame. The conditioning frame is a set of latents.

custom_nodes.author: NimaNzrii
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-photoshop
custom_nodes.description: Photoshop node inside of ComfyUi, send and get data from Photoshop

custom_nodes.author: NimaNzrii
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-popup_preview
custom_nodes.description: popup preview for comfyui

custom_nodes.author: AI2lab
custom_nodes.title: comfyUI-tool-2lab
custom_nodes.description: Integrate non-painting capabilities into comfyUI, including data, algorithms, video processing, large models, etc., to facilitate the construction of more powerful workflows.

custom_nodes.author: LZC
custom_nodes.title: Hayo comfyui nodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:tensor_trans_pil, Make Transparent mask, MergeImages, words_generatee, load_PIL image

custom_nodes.author: MNeMoNiCuZ
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-mnemic-nodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Save Text File

custom_nodes.author: vienteck
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Chat-GPT-Integration
custom_nodes.description:
This extension is a reimagined version based on the [a/ComfyUI-QualityOfLifeSuit_Omar92](https://github.com/omar92/ComfyUI-QualityOfLifeSuit_Omar92) extension, and it supports integration with ChatGPT through the new OpenAI API.
NOTE: See detailed installation instructions on the [a/repository](https://github.com/vienteck/ComfyUI-Chat-GPT-Integration).

custom_nodes.author: Haoming02
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Tab Handler
custom_nodes.description: This is an Extension for ComfyUI, which moves the menu to the specified corner on startup.

custom_nodes.author: glibsonoran
custom_nodes.title: Plush-for-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Style Prompt, OAI Dall_e Image. Plush contains two OpenAI enabled nodes: Style Prompt: Takes your prompt and the art style you specify and generates a prompt from ChatGPT3 or 4 that Stable Diffusion can use to generate an image in that style. OAI Dall_e 3: Takes your prompt and parameters and produces a Dall_e3 image in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: Aegis72
custom_nodes.title: AegisFlow Utility Nodes
custom_nodes.description: These nodes will be placed in comfyui/custom_nodes/aegisflow and contains the image passer (accepts an image as either wired or wirelessly, input and passes it through. Latent passer does the same for latents, and the Preprocessor chooser allows a passthrough image and 10 controlnets to be passed in AegisFlow Shima. The inputs on the Preprocessor  chooser should not be renamed if you intend to accept image inputs wirelessly through UE nodes. It can be done, but the send node input regex for each controlnet preprocessor column must also be changed.

custom_nodes.author: concarne000
custom_nodes.title: ConCarneNode
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Bing Image Grabber node for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: Haoming02
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Menu Anchor
custom_nodes.description: This is an Extension for ComfyUI, which moves the menu to the specified corner on startup.

custom_nodes.author: glifxyz
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-GlifNodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Consistency VAE Decoder.

custom_nodes.author: kijai
custom_nodes.title: Marigold depth estimation in ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description:
This is a wrapper node for Marigold depth estimation: [https://github.com/prs-eth/Marigold](https://github.com/kijai/ComfyUI-Marigold). Currently using the same diffusers pipeline as in the original implementation, so in addition to the custom node, you need the model in diffusers format.
NOTE: See details in repo to install.

custom_nodes.author: spacepxl
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Image-Filters
custom_nodes.description: Image and matte filtering nodes for ComfyUI `image/filters/*`

custom_nodes.author: Haoming02
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Clear Screen
custom_nodes.description: This is an Extension for ComfyUI, which adds a button, CLS, to clear the console window.

custom_nodes.author: deroberon
custom_nodes.title: demofusion-comfyui
custom_nodes.description: The Demofusion Custom Node is a wrapper that adapts the work and implementation of the [a/DemoFusion](https://ruoyidu.github.io/demofusion/demofusion.html) technique created and implemented by Ruoyi Du to the Comfyui environment.

custom_nodes.author: Haoming02
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-prompt-format
custom_nodes.description: This is an Extension for ComfyUI, which helps formatting texts.

custom_nodes.author: brianfitzgerald
custom_nodes.title: StyleAligned for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Implementation of the [a/StyleAligned](https://style-aligned-gen.github.io/) paper for ComfyUI. This node allows you to apply a consistent style to all images in a batch; by default it will use the first image in the batch as the style reference, forcing all other images to be consistent with it.

custom_nodes.author: MitoshiroPJ
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Slothful Attention
custom_nodes.description: This custom node allow controlling output without training. The reducing method is similar to [a/Spatial-Reduction Attention](https://paperswithcode.com/method/spatial-reduction-attention), but generating speed may not be increased on typical image sizes due to overheads. (In some cases, slightly slower)

custom_nodes.author: aria1th
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LogicUtils
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:UniformRandomFloat..., RandomShuffleInt, YieldableIterator..., LogicGate..., Add..., MergeString, MemoryNode, ...

custom_nodes.author: modusCell
custom_nodes.title: Preset Dimensions
custom_nodes.description: Simple node for sharing latent image size between nodes. Preset dimensions for SD and XL.

custom_nodes.author: mmaker
custom_nodes.title: Color Enhance
custom_nodes.description: Node: Color Enhance, Color Blend. This is the same algorithm GIMP/GEGL uses for color enhancement. The gist of this implementation is that it converts the color space to CIELCh(ab) and normalizes the chroma (or [colorfulness](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colorfulness)] component. Original source can be found in the link below.

custom_nodes.author: bruefire
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Sequential Image Loader
custom_nodes.description: This is an extension node for ComfyUI that allows you to load frames from a video in bulk and perform masking and sketching on each frame through a GUI.

custom_nodes.author: yolain
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Easy Use
custom_nodes.description: To enhance the usability of ComfyUI, optimizations and integrations have been implemented for several commonly used nodes.

custom_nodes.author: tzwm
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Browser
custom_nodes.description: This is an image/video/workflow browser and manager for ComfyUI. You could add image/video/workflow to collections and load it to ComfyUI. You will be able to use your collections everywhere.

custom_nodes.author: zcfrank1st
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-Toolbox
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Preview Json, Save Json, Test Json Preview, ... preview and save nodes

custom_nodes.author: 80sVectorz
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Static-Primitives
custom_nodes.description: Adds Static Primitives to ComfyUI. Mostly to work with reroute nodes
